summary: Analyzed Boneyard completeness approaches: found three deprecated approaches (Syntactic, Duration, Semantic Canonical Model) all well-documented with deprecation notices. Existing material should be preserved as valuable historical documentation. Recommended adding cross-reference notes to clarify standard Kripke vs task-specific semantics distinction.

artifacts.summary: Comprehensive analysis of Boneyard completeness approaches, identifying three deprecated methods and recommending documentation enhancements rather than removal
